sentences.en: A flock of birds was already warbling a cheerful morning chorus.
sentences.cn: 一群鸟儿已经齐声唱起了欢快的晨曲。

sentences.en: a spiritual that segued into a singalong chorus
sentences.cn: 一首转为会众集体跟唱的灵歌

sentences.en: All of us joined lustily in the chorus.
sentences.cn: 我们全都劲头十足地加入了合唱.

sentences.en: Caroline sang two verses and the chorus of her song.
sentences.cn: 卡罗琳唱了她歌曲中的两段和副歌部分。
唱到副歌时，大家都跟着齐唱起来。

sentences.en: He produced "A Chorus Line", Broadway's longest running show.
sentences.cn: 他制作推出了《歌舞线上》这一百老汇经久不衰的剧目。

sentences.en: He was greeted with a rousing chorus of Happy Birthday.
sentences.cn: 迎接他的是大家齐唱《祝你生日快乐》，令他非常感动。

sentences.en: I sing with the university chorus.
sentences.cn: 我在大学合唱队里唱歌。
把最后的副歌再唱一遍.

sentences.en: The children repeated the words after her in chorus.
sentences.cn: 孩子们跟她齐声朗读单词.

sentences.en: The chorus was seated above the orchestra.
sentences.cn: 合唱队的座位高于乐队席.

sentences.en: The chorus was singing "The Ode to Joy".
The professor's speech was welcomed with a chorus of praise.
sentences.cn: 教授的讲演受到一片称赞.

sentences.en: The students began to read the text in chorus.
sentences.cn: 学生们开始齐声朗读课文.

sentences.en: Their voices blend marvellously as they sing in chorus.
sentences.cn: 他们合唱时嗓音非常和谐.

sentences.en: Tom sang the verses and everybody joined in chorus.
sentences.cn: 汤姆唱独唱部分,然后大家一起唱合唱部分.
